content: Hi, I am Mahmut Bulut. Working on Rust since 2012. Yes 2012. Not a new member. I worked on compiler with intermittent intervals on Atomics, match arms, valgrind checks, some soundness tests. My mentor is @oli and I want to work on miri related things. Currently there are couple of open and closed PRs to some I-unsound and Miri related things from my side. I am happy to work on these topics. I might need heavy guidance because I didn't contributed for a long time. + recent LLVM ICEbreaker here.
